document_data.name: Krull
document_data.Description: Krull had his entire shell carved with runes of prayers to Tiamat in [[Draconic language|Draconic]].
document_data.Possessions: Krull wielded a ''[[maul|+1 maul]]'', and carried five ''[[Potions of healing|potions of healing]]'' and two ''[[soul coin]]s'' in a bag.
document_data.Activities: The [[Death domain|death-priest]] conducted numerous experiments in [[Arkhan's Tower]] in [[Avernus]] in an attempt to control the ''[[Hand of Vecna]]'' wielded by [[Arkhan]]. He was interested in obtaining [[artifact]]s and creatures that might help with his experiments, such as an ''[[orb of dragonkind]]'' or a [[unicorn]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}},{{BG-DiA-time}} after conquering the tower that served as Krull's laboratory, Arkhan left a complement of [[dragon]]s and [[undead]] servants under Krull's command to garrison the tower while he went to a nearby [[Monument to Tiamat|monument]] to commune with Tiamat.
